Description: Horizontal panel with a fountain with a large globe topped with a crown and children supporting a dish. Around the bottom, female figures with cornucopias. In the background, at far left and right, additional fountains with statues set in a garden with parterres.  From a series of six plates with designs for fountains. Two of the plates are dated 1701 and the series was included in the completed works of Marot published in 1703.
Provenance: Vendor: P. & D. Colnaghi & Co., Ltd., London
